attributes.attribute: 50watt Low voltage spotlight for suitable for banners, pop-ups and panel systems

50watt lamp;Available in Silver;3m power lead with UK or Euro plug fittings;Telescopic arm;Includes 240V transformer;Supplied with universal fittings enabling the light to be fitted to banners, pop-ups modular panel systems and Arena 4 Gantry;Supplied individually or as 2 or 4 light kits;<FONT color=#ff0000>2 or 4 light kits include lights, a carry case and a 4 way extension cable</FONT>

35watt Low Voltage spotlight designed specially for use with banner stands. <STRONG><FONT color=#ff0000>NB - This product is being discontinued and is only available whilst stocks last.</FONT></STRONG>

35watt MR16 lamp;Supplied with a 3.35m power lead and transformer; Choice of UK or Euro style plug;Available in Silver;Twin curved arms; Adjustable head;Integral bulldog clip specifically designed for banner stand poles;Supplied individually or as 2 or 4 light kits;<FONT color=#ff0000>2 or 4 light kits include lights, a carry case and a 4 way extension cable</FONT><FONT color=#000000>;</FONT><FONT color=#ff0000><STRONG>Black variant discontinued August 06</STRONG></FONT>
50watt Low voltage spotlight for suitable for banners, pop-ups and panel systems

50watt MR16 push fit lamp;Available in Black or Silver <FONT color=#ff0000><STRONG>(price freeze offer only application to black)</STRONG></FONT>;3m power lead with UK or Euro plug fittings;400mm straight arm;Adjustable head;Includes 240V transformer;Supplied with universal fittings enabling the light to be fitted to banners, pop-ups modular panel systems and Arena 4 Gantry;Supplied individually or as 2 or 4 light kits;<FONT color=#ff0000>2 or 4 light kits include lights, a carry case and a 4 way extension cable</FONT>
35watt Low Voltage spotlight light designed specifically for use with banner stands.

35watt MR11 lamp;Supplied with 2.5m lead (additional 4m of cable from transformer);Available in Silver;Quarter circle curved arm; Adjustable head;Integral bulldog clip specifically designed for banner stand poles;Supplied individually or as 2 or 4 light kits;<FONT color=#ff0000>2 or 4 light kits include lights, a carry case and a 4 way extension cable</FONT>
